class.name: BlitMaterial
class.brief_description: A material that processes blit calls to a DrawableTexture.
class.description: A material resource that can be used by DrawableTextures when processing blit calls to draw.

members.member: The manner in which the newly blitted texture is blended with the original DrawableTexture.

constants.constant: Mix blending mode. Colors are assumed to be independent of the alpha (opacity) value.
